summary: There's a commercial announcing the Iron Man movies on TV here right now and it's literally a full minute of people just saying...

summary: Captain America Civil War is THE Gayest™️ romance movie ever
body:
Captain America Civil War is THE Gayest™️ romance movie ever

Steve fought Iron Man to the near death AND basically gave up the goodie mantle of Captain America to save the murderous love of his life, Bucky. If that’s not (toxic) love I dunno what is. If you don’t see it that way i dunno what to tell you.

reblog.comment:
Captain America Civil War is THE Gayest™️ romance movie ever

Steve fought Iron Man to the near death AND basically gave up the goodie mantle of Captain America to save the murderous love of his life, Bucky. If that’s not (toxic) love I dunno what is. If you don’t see it that way i dunno what to tell you.

trail.content_raw:
Captain America Civil War is THE Gayest™️ romance movie ever

Steve fought Iron Man to the near death AND basically gave up the goodie mantle of Captain America to save the murderous love of his life, Bucky. If that’s not (toxic) love I dunno what is. If you don’t see it that way i dunno what to tell you.
trail.content:
Captain America Civil War is THE Gayest™️ romance movie ever

Steve fought Iron Man to the near death AND basically gave up the goodie mantle of Captain America to save the murderous love of his life, Bucky. If that’s not (toxic) love I dunno what is. If you don’t see it that way i dunno what to tell you.

summary: Peter, during a mission: Mr. Stark! You're hurt! That's a lot of blood, you might need a blood transfusion! What's your blood...
body:
Peter, during a mission: Mr. Stark! You’re hurt! That’s a lot of blood, you might need a blood transfusion! What’s your blood type?

Tony: B positive

Peter:

Peter: I’m trying! But youre losing a lot of blood.

title: Safe In Your Arms
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2P46CMV

by Danesincry

safe
/sāf/
adjective
1.
protected from or not exposed to danger or risk; not likely to be harmed or lost.

“Safe is Peter curled up in the arms of someone he knows. Arms of Tony, Pepper, May, Ned, or MJ curled around him… Safe is normal. Safe is sweet and comforting. Safe is a lie we tell ourselves to escape the reality that everything isn’t actually safe.”

Words: 506, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 1 of MCU Conceptual IronDad&SpiderSon

  • Fandoms: Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017), Captain America (Movies), The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Marvel Cinematic Universe
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: Other
  • Characters: Peter Parker, Tony Stark, Ned Leeds, Michelle Jones, Avengers Team (MCU), May Parker (Spider-Man), Pepper Potts, Thanos (Marvel)
  • Relationships: Peter Parker & Tony Stark, Ned Leeds & Peter Parker, Michelle Jones & Peter Parker, Peter Parker & Avengers Team

blog.name: aceycook
blog.title: c l a r k e

summary: i decided to study electrical engineering (my dad is an electrical engineer btw) and i was talking to a friend about how...
body: i decided to study electrical engineering (my dad is an electrical engineer btw) and i was talking to a friend about how somebody that i admire a lot inspired me to pursue a career in that field, and my friend thought that i was talking about my dad like that kind of person that says “my dad is my hero”, but plot twist i was talking about tony stark and honestly i have no regrets
